full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Information

* **Title**: Cancelled-2023-00283 (***Annulé-2023-00283***)
* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01009595
* **Solicitation Number**: 2023-00283
* **Publication Date**: October 7, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 16, 2022, 14:00:00
* **Tender Status**: Cancelled (***Annulé***)

## Tender Details

* **Industry Category**: Translation Services (***Services de traduction***)
* **Procurement Category**: SRV (***Services***)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (***Demande de propositions***)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding (***Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner***)
* **Selection Criteria**: None
* **Trade Agreements**: Vast array of international trade agreements, including the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), etc.

## Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Canadian Food Inspection Agency (***Agence canadienne d'inspection des aliments***)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, ON K1A 0Y9, Canada

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Teresa McKenny
* **Contact Email**: [Teresa.McKenny@canada.ca](mailto:Teresa.McKenny@canada.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: 343-573-4193
* **Contact Fax**: None

## Note

This tender announcement has been cancelled. All further inquiries should be directed to the Contracting Entity. [Teresa.McKenny@canada.ca](mailto:Teresa.McKenny@canada.ca) is the designated contact person. Please note that international trade agreements may apply to this tender. 

The reason I chose to keep so much detail was that I wanted to make sure that the traduction for both English and French were included.
